Package com.lantanagroup.link.config.api

Class ApiConfig

java.lang.Object
com.lantanagroup.link.config.api.ApiConfig
@Configuration @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="api") @Validated @PropertySource(value="classpath:application.yml", factory=YamlPropertySourceFactory.class) public class ApiConfig extends Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    @PositiveOrZero Integer
    maxRetry
    api.max-retry
    The number of times the API should try to check that prerequisite services are available.
    @javax.validation.constraints.PositiveOrZero int
    retryWait
    api.retry-wait
    The number of milliseconds the API should wait in between attempts at checking that prerequisite services are available.

  • Field Details

    • maxRetry

      @PositiveOrZero public @PositiveOrZero Integer maxRetry
      api.max-retry
      The number of times the API should try to check that prerequisite services are available. If the retry value is null the check will run indefinitely.

    • retryWait

      @PositiveOrZero public @javax.validation.constraints.PositiveOrZero int retryWait
      api.retry-wait
      The number of milliseconds the API should wait in between attempts at checking that prerequisite services are available.
